name: Skorupi

evolution.description: Skorupi can evolve into Drapion at level 10 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 13 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Scorpion Pokémon. It grips prey with its tail claws and injects poison. It tenaciously hangs on until the poison takes.

abilities.name: Battle Armor
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to extra damage dealt by a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: On a critical hit made by this Pokémon, triple the dice roll instead of doubling it.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: This Pokémon ignores disadvantage when it relates to sight.
